title: [Tizen] Change tizen graphics backend engine
body:
**Description of Change**
 This PR replace Tizen backend graphics engine for MAUI handlers

 Tizen backend graphics engine will be changed on this [PR](https://github.com/dotnet/maui/pull/9619)
 This PR is preparing it

* I add target framework net6-tizen on SkiaSharp.Views.Tizen project and it is supporting a new graphics engine called as NUI
* I remove tizen code on SkiaSharp.Views.Maui.Controls.Compatibility because Tizen New grapchis engine not support maui.controls.compatibility



 Test with locally referencing with MAUI on this [PR](https://github.com/dotnet/maui/pull/9619)
![skiasharp](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1029155/186821666-a1a7dd02-c370-4536-b592-4fa6960649ec.gif)


**Bugs Fixed**

- Fixes #
